record.dc:title: 35BY11 Rymer Site 15BY11, Bradley Co., TN. Feature 20, pottery vessel in fireplace. Floor, firebasin, and wattle. Square 17R11. Direction east.
record.wpa:narrative: Area of wattle overlying burned floor and firebasin. Firebasin burned hard but does not appear to be lined with puddled clay. No curb on basin. A tentative rectangular outline of post molds was found, see ground plan. This feature is probably a plowed away sunken structure. In firebasin was a large olla - fea. 869. Dendrochronology specimen #11 taken from post near edge of floor. Top of post at floor level.
